clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in perihilar region.
Pleural effusion on the perihilar region side, moderate in size.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of perihilar region.
Focal consolidation in perihilar region with air bronchogram.
Small pneumothorax on the perihilar region side.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
